General.Name: Inox Wind Limited
General.Description: Inox Wind Limited manufactures and distributes wind turbine generators and components for independent power producers, utilities, public sector undertakings, businesses, and private investors in India. The company provides wind turbine generator components, including nacelles, hubs, rotor blade sets, and tubular towers. It also offers a range of services, such as wind resource assessment, site acquisition, infrastructure development, erection, procurement and commissioning, and long-term operations and maintenance services for wind power projects. The company was incorporated in 2009 and is headquartered in Noida, India. Inox Wind Limited is a subsidiary of Inox Wind Energy Limited.
